nodes.text: The Judiciary Committee was a Galactic Senate legislative committee of the Galactic Republic that was active during the Clone Wars, which lasted from 22 BBY to 19 BBY. The Internal Activities Committee, which had the power to bring criminal charges against individuals, was part of the Judiciary Committee.

The Judiciary Committee was introduced in the new Star Wars canon in the 2019 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying supplementary sourcebook Rise of the Separatists. The Judiciary Committee was first mentioned in James Luceno's 2012 Star Wars Legends novel Darth Plagueis.
